rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人工智能智能手机应用程序在诊断儿童耳部感染方面显示出希望UPMC 和匹兹堡大学的医师科学家开发了一款新的手机应用程序，该应用程序使用人工智能 (AI) 来准确诊断耳部感染或急性中耳炎 (AOM)，可以帮助减少幼儿不必要的抗生素使用。今天发表在《美国医学会儿科杂志》上的新研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/AI-smartphone-app-shows-promise-in-diagnosing-ear-infections-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/AI-smartphone-app-shows-promise-in-diagnosing-ear-infections-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7e0ed1a-d440-4420-842c-4027e6c9117b Mon, 04 Mar 2024 13:03:19 -0500 AI smartphone app shows promise in diagnosing ear infections in children
研究揭示了有精神疾病风险的个人康复的更广泛要素康复对有精神疾病风险的人意味着什么的定义应该不仅仅限于症状缓解，还应扩展到更广泛的生活和福祉领域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Study-reveals-broader-elements-of-personal-recovery-for-individuals-at-risk-of-mental-illness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Study-reveals-broader-elements-of-personal-recovery-for-individuals-at-risk-of-mental-illness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27e0d9db-6e22-4c42-8751-3af2d0878bf0 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 12:58:28 -0500 Study reveals broader elements of personal recovery for individuals at risk of mental illness
研究人员发现了一种无创、低成本的口腔癌检测方法口腔癌和癌前口腔病变被认为特别难以早期准确诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Researchers-discover-a-nonpressive-low-cost-test-to-detect-oral-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Researchers-discover-a-nonpressive-low-cost-test-to-detect-oral-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa4c1959-0163-40f3-95a7-226bb4c8f392 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 12:52:33 -0500 Researchers discover a noninvasive, low-cost test to detect oral cancer
加州大学旧金山分校的科学家发现了一种针对天使综合征的微创产前治疗方法加州大学旧金山分校的科学家发现，通过羊水输送药物与通过脑脊液输送到胎儿大脑一样有效，这一发现为治疗出生前一些严重疾病的侵入性较小的方法打开了大门。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/UCSF-scientists-discover-less-having-prenatal-treatment-for-Angelman-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/UCSF-scientists-discover-less-having-prenatal-treatment-for-Angelman-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b0ce4c9-808a-4433-9032-7357c97a1c4d Mon, 04 Mar 2024 12:47:45 -0500 UCSF scientists discover less invasive prenatal treatment for Angelman syndrome
廉价的液体和牙科密封剂一样可以防止蛀牙纽约大学牙科学院研究人员的一项新研究表明，一种名为氟化二胺银 (SDF) 的廉价防蛀液体与牙科密封剂一样，可以在学校蛀牙预防和治疗计划中防止蛀牙。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Inexpense-liquid-works-as-well-as-dental-sealants-to-keep-tooth-decay-at-bay.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Inexpense-liquid-works-as-well-as-dental-sealants-to-keep-tooth-decay-at-bay.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a457e7e-e002-40bf-9e30-4f21f0764fa8 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 12:42:52 -0500 Inexpensive liquid works as well as dental sealants to keep tooth decay at bay
机器人髋关节外骨骼可能是中风康复的一个有前途的途径超过 80% 的中风幸存者存在行走困难，严重影响他们的日常生活、独立性和整体生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Robotic-hip-exosculpt-could-be-a-promising-avenue-for-中风-rehabilitation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Robotic-hip-exosculpt-could-be-a-promising-avenue-for-中风-rehabilitation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3746291-3479-4feb-9a94-b6952d3fa0b9 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 12:25:44 -0500 Robotic hip exoskeleton could be a promising avenue for stroke rehabilitation
纳米粒子疗法为主动脉瘤治疗带来希望主动脉瘤是主动脉的隆起，主动脉是将富氧血液从心脏输送到身体其他部位的最大血管。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Nanoarticle-therapy-offers-hope-for-aortic-aneurysm-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Nanoarticle-therapy-offers-hope-for-aortic-aneurysm-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de077ee6-3be5-4960-882f-a5ae772459db Mon, 04 Mar 2024 12:19:10 -0500 Nanoparticle therapy offers hope for aortic aneurysm treatment
研究证实同时使用艾滋病毒药物和性别确认激素疗法新的研究明确表明，艾滋病毒抗逆转录病毒药物可以与性别确认激素疗法一起服用，而不会改变这两种药物的疗效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Research-validates-concurrent-use-of-HIV-medications-and-gender-affirming-hormone-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Research-validates-concurrent-use-of-HIV-medications-and-gender-affirming-hormone-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45b3e4de-8eaa-4df2-b10c-a65ac1d78559 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 12:06:04 -0500 Research validates concurrent use of HIV medications and gender-affirming hormone therapy
青少年（尤其是超重女孩）对 DASH 饮食的坚持增加与代谢性疾病的可能性降低有关研究人员评估了伊朗超重和肥胖青少年的饮食控制方法（DASH）与代谢健康状况之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Increased-adherence-to-DASH-diet-lated-to-decreased-probabilities-of-metabolic-disease-conditions-among-adolescents-pspecially-overweight-女孩.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Increased-adherence-to-DASH-diet-lated-to-decreased-probabilities-of-metabolic-disease-conditions-among-adolescents-pspecially-overweight- girls.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b0bde2f-16fe-4a6e-8c95-9efc74f457a2 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 12:02:00 -0500 Increased adherence to DASH diet related to decreased probabilities of metabolic disease conditions among adolescents, particularly overweight girls
新方法彻底改变了清醒小鼠的体内脑成像人脑有数十亿个神经元。它们共同作用，实现更高阶的大脑功能，例如认知和复杂行为。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/New-method-revolutionizes-in-vivo-brain-imaging-in-awake-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/New-method-revolutionizes-in-vivo-brain-imaging-in-awake-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ee3a25f-1336-4813-9d12-7c7f853c67d9 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 11:51:05 -0500 New method revolutionizes in vivo brain imaging in awake mice
